name: Windows wizard
blurb: This idea was born on a a sunny day, when my mom was fighting with dirty windows. At that moment I understood that a seemingly simple task was taking up a lot of time and energy, despite the hard work the window was still smeared. This situation inspired me to construct the "Windows Wizard", a robot, which cleans and polish windows by itself. It doesnt matter how big the mess, what the weather is, it will handle everything - BY ITSELF. I know that for many people the worst type of cleaning is cleaning windows. Thankfully, this problem is disappearing thanks to my "Windows Wizard".

rewards.reward: It will be gratifying, that you appreciate my hard work and dedication. I will send you a brochure with before and after pictures of windows which I developed during my construction if the "Window Wizard".

On my website and blog I will place your name on a list of donors supporting my project as well as my golden tips for clean windows (a few small tricks which will make your cleaning much easier), additionally an invitation to a concert, of a band "Life Behind Glass"  having the goal of financing a commercial of my invention. Of course you will also receive VIP seating!
